heading: Do young people have enough voice in politics?
subheading: The participation of young people under 30 years in national parliaments does not reflect their share in the population across European countries.
textSource: Inter-Parliamentary Union - Youth participation in national parliaments 2023
textNote: Actual number of MEPs younger than 30 years: 13 of 705. The data represented here is based on the representation in the respective lower chamber of parliament in each country.
